Text: lol what's the point of uploading the manual only
You would understand if you ever played a Paradox game. They are literally unplayable unless you have the manual open and are constantly referring to it. More like exams than video games, really.

Thanks a ton mate. This game is so hard to play if you pick the wrong guy to start with. You get no pointers or help so you have no idea what to do. Hopefully this manual will help out a bit. I was playing for 6-8 hours last night and had no idea wtf i was doing.
